entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse It's no secret that @realDonaldTrump downplayed the COVID-19 pandemic for precious weeks while he stupidly heaped praise on communist dictator Xi Jinping for his strength and transparency in handling the COVID-19 outbreak.

https://t.co/5yvQ8icOHp https://t.co/p2qrODuFjP
